column2: Potion of Chameleon
Imbibe a Potion of Chameleon, which drastically increases your plot power for its duration.
Potion of Longevity
Imbibe a Potion of Longevity, temporarily lowering your Health, but permanently increasing your Health by a lesser amount.
Potion of Fortify Health
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Health, greatly increasing your Health for a limited time.
Potion of Virility
Imbibe a Potion of Virility for a temporary fertility boost.
Potion of Fortify Strength
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Strength, temporarily heightening your Combat Skill and Martial attribute.
Potion of Fortify Personality
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Personality, which raises your Diplomacy attribute and makes you more popular with all other characters while it persists.
Potion of Fortify Luck
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Luck, augmenting your Stewardship attribute for a limited duration.
Potion of Fortify Intelligence
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Intelligence, which temporarily raises your Learning attribute.
Potion of Fortify Agility
Imbibe a Potion of Fortify Agility to improve your Intrigue attribute for a short time.
Draught of Regeneration
Imbibe a Draught of Regeneration, encouraging much of your body's resources to mending your broken physique, but at great and lasting cost to your personal health.
Transformative Elixir

Imbibe a Transformative Elixir, alchemically reconfiguring your body to that of the opposite sex. Be warned, such an advanced concoction comes with great risk. (Developer's note: This potion may undergo major revisions in the future. Current implementation should be considered a proof-of-concept, and feedback is appreciated. -Ev P.S. Yes this is lore-friendly.)
Not under the effects of any other Potion
Not under the effects of any other Potion
Spoiled Potion
[Root.GetDynName] has taken a spoiled potion, and is feeling quite ill as a result.
Potion of Chameleon
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Chameleon, conferring increased plot power.
Potion of Longevity
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Longevity. While such potions increase the fortitude of the imbiber in the long term, they take a toll on the body in the short term.
Potion of Fortify Health
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Fortify Health, greatly increasing their fortitude
Potion of Virility
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Virility, boosting their fertility for a time.
Potion of Fortify Strength
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Fortify Strength, increasing their combat prowess.
Potion of Fortify Personality
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Fortify Personality - indeed, they seem far more likable than you remembered...
Potion of Fortify Luck
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Fortify Luck and seems to be having a way with money!
Potion of Fortify Intelligence

[Root.GetDynName] would certainly seem to possess the attributes of an individual beholden to the given effects of a Potion of Fortify Intelligence, greatly increasing their mental capacity as well as their verbosity.
Potion of Fortify Agility
[Root.GetDynName] is under the effects of a Potion of Fortify Agility, increasing their intrigue.
Draught of Regeneration

[Root.GetDynName] is experiencing the after-effects of a Draught of Regeneration, [Root.GetHerHis] body severely weakened after devoting extreme amounts of energy and resources to repairing major damage.
Transformative Elixir

[Root.GetDynName] is experiencing the after-effects of a Transformative Elixir, [Root.GetHerHis] body severely weakened after devoting extreme amounts of energy and resources to major anatomical reconfiguration.
Visit an Alchemist
Enter the establishment of a local alchemist, who has a wide range of potions you may purchase with varying effects!
Return to the Market
Within a Shop
Exit the current area and return to the Marketplace.
